meta.prevIdentifier: Death Korps Centaur Light Assault Carrier

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If this model starts its move within 1" of a friendly ASTRA MILITARUM ARTILLERY model, it can choose to tow it so long as neither this model nor the ARTILLERY model is within 1" of an enemy model. If it does this, this model immediately makes a move of up to 12" The ARTILLERY model is then placed anywhere withing 1" of this model so that no part of the ARTILLERY model has moved more than 12" from where it started. An ARTILLERY model that has been towed may not fire its weapons during the Shooting phase of the same turn.
